name: IceBoxLinux
short_description:
Released in 2004. Back in development and re-release target of mid June 1014.

This release is a whole new build from the ground-up with a whole new way of "Doing Things" !
IceBox Linux OS is not just another box to sit in front of to work, play, etc.
What is IceBox already !
Try to think Plan9, but with the access to interact with with almost any device we already use every day. 
IceBox will help "things" that talk to other "things" talk to the Internet so that you can access, control, work with, enjoy, and even share - your "things".
The IceBox is - the glue - that sticks all your devices, content, home automation (if you have that), your cars, and almost everything else. You know - "All your Things" in one convient virtual space.
So that you can access, control, and interact with almost anywhere and almost anyway you wish.
I know, How are you going to do that. And there are already programs out there that do that...

Not like this. Just hang tight and wait for the release
summary: The IceBox Linux Distribution is back.
